actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act with respect to shareholder claims arising from the appointment of a conservator or receiver for certain depository institutions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Independent and Community Bank Shareholders Protection Act

summary.text:
Independent and Community Bank Shareholders Protection Act 

This bill provides that shareholders of certain small financial institutions that are under conservatorship or receivership may file claims with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation for just compensation.

titles.title: Independent and Community Bank Shareholders Protection Act
To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act with respect to shareholder claims arising from the appointment of a conservator or receiver for certain depository institutions, and for other purposes.
